flavorText: Young Eldrazi crawl forth from the dust, compelled by a greater will.

foreignData.flavorText: Junge Eldrazi krabbeln aus dem Staub, befehligt von einem höheren Willen.
foreignData.name: Laichgründe
foreignData.text: {T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}.{6}, {T}, opfere die Laichgründe: Bringe drei 1/1 farblose Eldrazi-Brut-Kreaturenspielsteine ins Spiel. Sie haben „Opfere diese Kreatur: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}."

foreignData.flavorText: Los jóvenes Eldrazi surgen reptando del polvo, impulsados por una voluntad más poderosa que ellos.
foreignData.name: Lecho de crianza
foreignData.text: {T}: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná.{6}, {T}, sacrificar el Lecho de crianza: Pon en el campo de batalla tres fichas de criatura Vástago Eldrazi incoloras 1/1. Tienen "Sacrificar esta criatura: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná".

foreignData.flavorText: Les jeunes Eldrazi sortent de la poussière, contraints par une volonté plus puissante.
foreignData.name: Lieu de prolifération
foreignData.text: {T} : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve.{6}, {T}, sacrifiez le Lieu de prolifération : Mettez sur le champ de bataille trois jetons de créature 1/1 incolore Eldrazi et Scion. Ils ont « Sacrifiez cette créature : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve. »

foreignData.flavorText: I giovani Eldrazi strisciano fuori dalla polvere, governati da una volontà superiore.
foreignData.name: Alveo di Procreazione
foreignData.text: {T}: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana.{6}, {T}, Sacrifica l'Alveo di Procreazione: Metti sul campo di battaglia tre pedine creatura Discendente Eldrazi 1/1 incolori. Hanno "Sacrifica questa creatura: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana".

foreignData.flavorText: エルドラージの幼体は塵から這い出すと巨大な意思に導かれて進んでゆく。
foreignData.name: 繁殖苗床
foreignData.text: {T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。{6}, {T}, 繁殖苗床を生け贄に捧げる：無色の１/１のエルドラージ・末裔・クリーチャー・トークンを３体戦場に出す。それらは「このクリーチャーを生け贄に捧げる：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。」を持つ。

foreignData.flavorText: 새끼 엘드라지가 거대한 의지에 이끌려 먼지 속에서 기어 나온다.
foreignData.name: 부화지
foreignData.text: {T}: {1}을 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.{6}, {T}, 부화지를 희생한다: 1/1 무색 엘드라지 자손 생물 토큰 세 개를 전장에 놓는다. 그 생물들은 "이 생물을 희생한다: 당신의 마나풀에 {1}을 담는다."를 가진다.

foreignData.flavorText: Jovens Eldrazi saem rastejando do pó, impelidos por uma vontade maior.
foreignData.name: Leito de Procriação
foreignData.text: {T}: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana.{6}, {T}, Sacrifique Leito de Procriação: Coloque no campo de batalha três fichas de criatura incolores 1/1 do tipo Rebento Eldrazi. Elas têm "Sacrifique esta criatura: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana."

foreignData.flavorText: Юные Эльдрази выбираются из праха, подчиняясь воле повелителя.
foreignData.name: Ложе Порождения
foreignData.text: {T}: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны.{6}, {T}, пожертвуйте Ложе Порождения: положите на поле битвы три фишки существа 1/1 бесцветный Эльдрази Отпрыск. Они имеют способность «Пожертвуйте это существо: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны».

foreignData.flavorText: 幼小的奥札奇在更强大的意志驱使下，自尘土匍匐而出。
foreignData.name: 孳息温床
foreignData.text: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。{6}，{T}，牺牲孳息温床：将三个1/1无色奥札奇／孽裔衍生生物放进战场。它们具有「牺牲此生物：加{1}到你的法术力池中。」

foreignData.flavorText: 幼小的奧札奇在更強大的意志驅使下，自塵土匍匐而出。
foreignData.name: 孳息溫床
foreignData.text: {T}：加{1}到你的魔法力池中。{6}，{T}，犧牲孳息溫床：將三個1/1無色奧札奇／孽裔衍生生物放進戰場。它們具有「犧牲此生物：加{1}到你的魔法力池中。」

name: Spawning Bed
originalText: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.{6}, {T}, Sacrifice Spawning Bed: Put three 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

rulings.text: Eldrazi Scions are similar to Eldrazi Spawn, seen in the Zendikar block. Note that Eldrazi Scions are 1/1, not 0/1.
Eldrazi and Scion are each separate creature types. Anything that affects Eldrazi will affect these tokens, for example.
Sacrificing an Eldrazi Scion creature token to add {C} to your mana pool is a mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

Some instants and sorceries that create Eldrazi Scions require targets. If all targets for such a spell have become illegal by the time that spell tries to resolve, the spell won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t get any Eldrazi Scions.

text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{6}, {T}, Sacrifice Spawning Bed: Create three 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
